# SystemHelper.RunCommandAsync method

Runs specified program with parameters.

```csharp
public static Task<StringBuilder> RunCommandAsync(string program, string arguments)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| program | Program name |
| arguments | Program arguments |

## Return Value

A String with output command result.
